snippet: Runners showed up in Central Park early Sunday to race in an underground marathon, complete with spectators holding signs, competition bibs and a finish line.
abstract: Thousands of runners show up early in Central Park to race in what some call an underground marathon--complete with spectators holding signs, competition bibs and a finish line--after New York City Marathon is canceled due to Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: Runners showed up in Central Park early Sunday to race in an underground marathon, complete with spectators holding signs, competition bibs and a finish line.

headline.seo: New York Marathoners Hold Race of Their Own
headline.main: Shadow Marathon Quenches a Desire to Run
